I

it.sauronsoftware.feed4j - package it.sauronsoftware.feed4j
This package contains the feed parser and its related exceptions.
it.sauronsoftware.feed4j.bean - package it.sauronsoftware.feed4j.bean
This package contains the feed object representation.
it.sauronsoftware.feed4j.html - package it.sauronsoftware.feed4j.html
This package contains some utilities to treat HTML fragments, often used in item descriptions.

O

optimize(String) - Static method in class it.sauronsoftware.feed4j.html.HTMLOptimizer
This method analyzes a HTML fragment fixing common mistakes and removing those attributes and tags usually useless for a feed reader.

P

parse(URL) - Static method in class it.sauronsoftware.feed4j.FeedParser
Gets the feed from an URL and parses it.

Gets the feed from an URL and parses it.
